荂字的基本解释

荂
fū
草木的花。
芙、蓟等的果实。
白茅的花。
茂盛：“松枯不荂，兰渐不泽。”

荂字的汉语字典释义

[①]［fū］
［《廣韻》芳無切，平虞，敷。］
［《廣韻》况于切，平虞，曉。］
草木开的花。

荂字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　荂； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页1030第04
【唐韻】芳無切，音敷。【韻會】榮也，華也。【爾雅·釋草】華，荂。【揚子·方言】華、荂，盛也。齊、楚之閒或謂之華，或謂之荂。【左思·吳都賦】異荂蓲蘛。　又人名。【晉書·劉琨傳】趙王倫子荂。　又【集韻】【正韻】?枯瓜切，音誇。義同。　又况于切，音吁。【爾雅·釋草】芺、薊，其實荂。【註】芺與薊頭，皆有蓊臺名荂，荂卽其實也。　又况華切，音花。【莊子·天地篇】大聲不入于里耳，《折揚》《皇荂》，則嗑然而笑。【註】《折揚》《皇荂》，皆古歌曲也。

荂字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
荂字的起名意思

草木的花；白茅的花。还表示草木茂盛。

Xian
Basic explanation of words
Xian
fū
Plants and flowers.
The fruits of Fu, thistle, etc.
Flower of Imperata cylindrica.
Luxuriant: "The pine is not dry, but the orchid is gradually declining."
Xian
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［fū］
["Guangyun" Fang Wuqie, Pingyu, Fu. ]
["Guangyun" Kuang Yuqi, Pingyu, Xiao. ]
Flowers blooming in vegetation.
Xian
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Chinese Characters] 　荂; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 1030 04
[Tang Yun] Fang Wuqi, sound compression. [Rhyme Club] Rong Ye, Hua Ye. 【Erya Shicao】Hua, Xun. 【Yangtze Dialect】Hua, Xun, Shengye. The leisure of Qi and Chu is called Zhihua or Zhixun. 【Zuo Si·Wu Du Fu】Heterogeneity.　Another name. [Book of Jin·Liu Kun Biography] Zhao Wanglunzi Xun.　[Ji Yun] [Zheng Yun]? Cut with dried melons, exaggerating the sound. The same meaning.　What's more, it's sound. 【Erya·Shucao】芺 and thistle are actually 荂. 【Note】Xiang and Jitou both have the name "Xiangtai", which is actually the same.　About Huaqie, Yinhua. [Zhuangzi·Heaven and Earth Chapter] The loudness is not in the ears, while "Zheyang" and "The Emperor", they laugh but laugh. [Note] "Zheyang" and "Emperor Xun" are all ancient songs.

Xian
Name meaning
The flowers of vegetation; the flowers of Imperata cylindrica. It also means lush vegetation.
kuā, fū, huā, xū
